document.full_text: right-wing lawmaker keiko fujimori is in a virtual tie with left-wing nationalist ollanta humala a month before peru's presidential election, a poll showed on wednesday, driving stocks higher.
document.title: new peru poll shows humala, fujimori nearly tied
lines_and_colors: right-wing lawmaker keiko fujimori is in a virtual tie with left-wing nationalist ollanta humala a month before peru's presidential election, a poll showed on wednesday, driving stocks higher.
